divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on my porch looking up into the sky on February 24, 2012 at approximcately 7:35 pm and witnessed a ufo at a low altitude moving roughly from south to north across the sky. I notice a very faint light coming my direction at a very rapid velocity. The light was highlighted on the front of the craft in a thin line almost unvisible. Unless you weren'tlooking at it you would not notice it. The shape looked like a triangle and got more prominent as it came closer to me. It moved very fast,smooth and silent through the sky. I saw it for maybe five seconds. It was as wide as the block that i live on! It was huge!!!!!! OMG! I cant believe i just saw a ufo!
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were 2 other sightings in Sacramento on or around February 24th 2012
Summary: triangular shape ufo sighting please read the detailed description
